sentences.sentence: Objective: To discuss the better processing method of Cornu Cerrvi.
sentences.translation: 前言：目的：探讨鹿角的最佳炮制方法。

sentences.sentence: OBJECTIVE To make the kit to identify Cornu Cervi Pantotrichum with molecular taxonomy.
sentences.translation: 目的建立中药材鹿茸的分子分类学鉴定试剂盒。

sentences.sentence: Methods Puncture was operated and tube was placed in former cornu of ventricles of brain.
sentences.translation: 方法床边锥颅侧脑室前角穿刺置管，复达欣灌注，结合腰穿脑脊液。
